title: Readout of President Joe Biden’s Call with President Ursula von der Leyen of the European Commission | The White House
content: President Joseph R. Biden, Jr. spoke today with President Ursula von der Leyen of the European Commission.  The two leaders discussed President von der Leyen’s recent trip to Beijing and their shared commitment to upholding the rules-based international order, human rights, and fair trade practices.  They reaffirmed the importance of maintaining peace and stability across the Taiwan Strait.  President Biden and President von der Leyen also reiterated the commitment of the United States and the European Union to ensure that Ukraine has the economic and security assistance it needs and to continuing to work closely together to impose costs on the Kremlin for Russia’s aggression.  The leaders also discussed ongoing joint efforts to accelerate the transition to clean energy economies.###
